name: Here Lies Frog
description:
Meet frog. Frog is dead, and stuck in purgatoady. But by staying dead-set on his goals and solving some gravely dangerous puzzles, he might be able to move through this "passage" to the afterlife! This project is a submission to the August 2019 Extra Credits "Passage" Jam.

CONTROLS: Arrow keys to move, and you can run by holding X. when you die, you'll respawn wherever you put your grave! Press C to restart a level.
